EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited to the 2019 Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> 2019 Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Summit WE KNOW LIFE GETS BUSY, REMEMBER TO RSVP BY MARCH 11TH
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/april/honeywell-aerospace-supplier-summit]]> Dear supplier,
You are among a select group of suppliers who are invited to our 2019 Honeywell Supplier Summit, which will be held April 3-4 at the Tempe Mission Palms Hotel, Arizona. Key summit themes will include business opportunities, supply chain initiatives, expectations, customers’ growth and its impact to our suppliers, among other important industry updates. You may be invited to additional meetings and will be notified separately if that is the case.
Day 1
April 3, 2019 Pre-Registration: 1:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Pre-Conference Sessions: 3:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Networking Reception: 6:00 p.m.-8:30 p.m.
Day 2
April 4, 2019 Registration: 7:30 a.m. Conference: 8:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m.
Location
Tempe Mission Palms
60 East 5th Street, Tempe, AZ 85281
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/april/honeywell-aerospace-supplier-summit]]>
Please RSVP by March 11, 2019. I look forward to seeing you at the Summit.
Sincerely,
Paul Ebertz Chief Procurement Officer Honeywell Aerospace
